title: hugry Hub
description: Created a MERN-based food delivery app with Razorpay payments, SMS/email auth via Twilio/Nodemailer, and order management. Features include user feedback, coupons, and secure role-based access.

title: Brain Flip
description: Developed a responsive emoji memory game using React with randomized cards, smooth match logic, and SweetAlert2 end-game alerts. Handled async events and state transitions for seamless gameplay..

title: Sahachari Center Kolmanna
description: Created a dynamic emoji-based memory game with randomized cards, smooth animations, and instant match feedback. Designed for responsive play and engaging user experience across devices.

title: Echomind
description: Co-developed EchoMind, an AI-powered chatbot designed with Clean Architecture. Worked collaboratively with a UI/UX designer to ensure a seamless user experience. The system features a centralized error handler, a single entry point for all API calls, and is fully tested for stability and maintainability.
